item.title: Create a favicon for your site
item.description: Find or create a suitable favicon for your site

item.title: How I created my favicon for this site
item.description: I created my own favicon with John Sorrentino’s Favicon.io. Here’s the settings I used to generate my favicon. Background: Rounded Font Family: Fira Code Font Variant: Bold 700 Normal Font Size: 80 Font Color: #FFFFFF Background Color: #145DA0 I got the background color from marmaid lagoon color palette from Canva.
